link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://xbrl.org/2010/filter/aspect-cover http://www.xbrl.org/2010/aspect-cover-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/custom-function http://www.xbrl.org/2010/custom-function-implementation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.ssm.com.my/taxonomy/2022-12-31/ssmt-dei-core ../../../../../def/ic/cor-ca2016/dei-cor/ssmt-dei-cor_2022-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2010/validation-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/instance http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-instance-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xlink-2003-12-31.xsd

gen:link.msg:message: Kindly report valid 8 character Audit firm number starting with "AF00" followed by valid numericals e.g. AF001800
Kindly report valid 6 character Audit firm number starting with "AF" followed by valid numericals e.g. AF1621
Kindly report valid Audit firm number
Type of auditor's opinion MUST be reported.
Registration number of audit firm MUST be reported.
Name of audit firm MUST be reported.
Address of audit firm MUST be reported.
New Company registration number MUST be reported.
Name of company MUST be reported.
Origin of company MUST be reported

va:valueAssertion.test: $V2 eq "Company limited by shares" or $V2 eq "Unlimited company" or $V2 eq "Company without shares"

gen:link.msg:message: If filers select "Origin of company" as "Incorporated outside Malaysia", THEN Type of company MUST be either "Company limited by shares" or "Unlimited company" or "Company without shares"
Status of company MUST be reported.
Type of company MUST be reported.
Application of submission MUST be reported.
Type of submission under Companies Act 1965 MUST be reported.
Financial year MUST be reported.
Disclosure of financial statements preparation for current submission MUST be reported.
Company's current financial year start date MUST be reported.
Company's current financial year end date MUST be reported.
Annual general meeting date MUST be reported if "Status of company" is "Public company".
Date of circulation of financial statements and reports to members MUST be reported.
Nature of financial statements MUST be reported.
Level of rounding used in financial statements MUST be reported.
Method used for preparing Statements of Financial Position MUST be reported.
Description of presentation currency MUST be reported.
Name and version of software used to generate XBRL file MUST be reported.
Taxonomy version MUST be reported.
When filer selects "Application of submission" as "Court order filing" or "Rectification filing with court order" THEN "Court Order reference number" is MANDATORY to be reported.

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq "Rectification filing with court order" or $V1 eq "Court order filing"

gen:link.msg:message: Company's current financial year start date should be less than 31 January 2017.
Kindly ensure "Status of company"is applicable as at year end of the financial statements submitted
Statutory Declaration for rectification is mandatory to be reported if user select "Application of submission" as Rectification filing.
"Statutory Declaration for rectification" should be more than or equal to "Company's current financial year end date"

When filer selects "Disclosure of financial statements preparation for current submission" as "Subsequent preparation of financial statements" THEN "Company's previous financial year start date" and "Company's previous financial year end date" are mandatory to be reported

va:valueAssertion.test: ((if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V1)>=4) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V1)>=2) else false))) or (if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V1)>=2) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V1)>=1) else false)))) and ((if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V5)>=4) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V5)>=2) else false))) or (if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V5)>=2) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V5)>=1) else false)))) and ((if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V6)>=4) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V6)>=2) else false))) or (if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V6)>=2) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V6)>=1) else false)))) and ((if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V7)>=4) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V7)>=2) else false))) or (if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V7)>=2) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V7)>=1) else false)))) and ((if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V8)>=4) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V8)>=2) else false))) or (if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V8)>=2) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V8)>=1) else false))))

gen:link.msg:message: "Non-current assets", "Current assets", "Non-current liabilities", "Current liabilities", "Fund and Reserve" MUST be reported

va:valueAssertion.test: ((if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V1)>=4) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V1)>=2) else false))) or (if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V1)>=2) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V1)>=1) else false)))) and ((if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V5)>=4) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V5)>=2) else false))) or (if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V5)>=2) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V5)>=1) else false)))) and ((if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V6)>=4) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:ConsolidatedMember")) then (count($V6)>=2) else false))) or (if(($V2= "Subsequent preparation of financial statements") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V6)>=2) else ((if(($V2 = "First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation") and ($V3 = "ssmt-1965:SeparateMember")) then (count($V6)>=1) else false))))

gen:link.msg:message: "Assets", "Liabilities", "Fund and Reserve" MUST be reported

gen:link.msg:message: "Income", "Expenditure", "Surplus (deficit) before tax", "Surplus (deficit) after tax", "Unappropriated profit brought forward" MUST be reported.
